name: ILIFEHOME
0:
”Alexa, turn on ILIFE robot.”
”Alexa, turn off ILIFE robot.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can control your vacuum by your voice. To get started make sure you download the ILIFEHOME App and registered a ILIFEHOME App account. Your ILIFEHOME robotic vacuum has connected and online. Then, you need to enable ILIFEHOME skills and fill in the ILIFEHOME App account on the authorization page. After using Alexa to discover the device, ILIFEHOME Robot will be added.

After successful connection, please try to say:

Alexa, turn on ILIFE robot.
Alexa, turn off ILIFE robot.
